engine.title: Research & Validation Engine
value.title: From Signals to Structure
value.intro: Most systems track events. We map structure: nodes, relationships, centrality, and how constraints propagate. The result is an auditable view of where value concentrates, where fragility hides, and where optionality truly exists.
features.1.title: Ecosystem Mapping
features.1.body: Map partners, suppliers, programs, contracts, and regulatory dependencies into a clear network view.
features.2.title: Dependency & Centrality
features.2.body: Identify critical nodes, single-source risks, replacement difficulty, and concentration traps across the ecosystem.
features.3.title: Constraint Propagation
features.3.body: Stress-test how shocks travel through the network (capacity, regulation, geopolitics, energy) and what breaks first.
features.4.title: Evidence Trail
features.4.body: Every claim is tied to a public source with traceability, confidence scoring, and consistency checks.
